name: Blastoise

ability.name: Overflow
ability.effect: For each additional Water Energy attached to your Active Pokemon not used to pay for its attack, it deals 10 more damage, up to 30.

attacks.name: Rain Dance
attacks.effect: Reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. You may attach up to 4 Water Energies to your Pokemon as you like. Shuffle the rest back into your deck.

flavor: These tanks bring torrential floods while fighting. Beach frequenters will rile them up just to ride the waves.
